title: Oscilloscope Rising Edge (Code 000h to FFFh)
summary: Oscilloscope screenshot showing a DAC output step edge, with zoomed residual/noise trace after the rising transition.

structured_data.description: Annotated graticule shows Trigger Pulse at 5 V/div, Rising Edge at 2 V/div, and zoomed rising edge at 100 uV/div. Horizontal scale text indicates Time (5 us/div).
